tool_description: Validates project timeline against grant deadline requirements, identifies potential scheduling conflicts, and assesses feasibility of meeting all submission and project milestones.

preparation_tasks.description: List of tasks needed before project start

preparation_duration_days.description: Total days needed for preparation tasks

error_messages: Invalid date format: All dates must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
Timeline conflict: Project start date is before submission deadline or insufficient preparation time.
Past deadline: Submission deadline has already passed based on current_date.
Invalid duration: project_duration_months must be a positive integer.
Insufficient preparation time: preparation_duration_days must be positive if specified.
usage: Provide submission_deadline, project_start_date, project_duration_months, and current_date. Optionally include preparation_tasks and preparation_duration_days for complete timeline analysis.

timeline_feasible.description: Whether the overall timeline is feasible

days_to_deadline.description: Number of days remaining until submission deadline

critical_path_days.description: Minimum days needed from current date to project completion
